nodes.text: A jefflac was a creature of the galaxy. While caught in a stampede of creatures fleeing from rancors on the planet Vodran, the Resistance group J-Squadron was occasionally nudged by a passing jefflac or bumbling dewback. These creatures had been left behind by Harra, a Hutt who had operated a trade in exotic creatures on the planet.

Jefflacs first appear in Join the Resistance, the first book of the Star Wars: Join the Resistance series by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker, a young readers title set in the time of the conflict between the Resistance and the First Order published on March 7, 2017. The creatures only appear in passing.
